FacebookLoggerFactory - Class in search
Get customized logger to FacebookSearch
FacebookSearch - Class in search
Contains the methods used to fetch posts from Facebook.
FacebookSearch(FacebookClient) - Constructor for class search.FacebookSearch
 
FacebookSearchMain - Class in search
Get posts from Facebook.
The restrictions and search outputs are defined on config.properties
Useful tools: https://developers.facebook.com/tools/accesstoken/
https://developers.facebook.com/tools/explorer/
FacebookSearchMain() - Constructor for class search.FacebookSearchMain

fetchUserPosts(String, Date) - Method in class search.FacebookSearch

filters - package filters
 
formatedPostStringToDate(String) - Static method in class util.DateManager
Convert a string post date with format E, MMM dd yyyy to a java calendar! Example of date: Fri, June 7 2013.
formatedStringDBToCalendar(String) - Static method in class util.DateManager
Convert a string with format yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS used in Mysql database to a java calendar!
formatedStringToDate(String) - Static method in class util.DateManager
Convert a string with format yyyy/MMM/dd (CAUTION month with characters, e.g JAN, FEB...) to a java calendar! Example of date 2015/Jan/02 year 2015, month 01 (Jan), day 02.
formatterDate - Static variable in class util.DateManager
Used to format datetime.
formatterDateDB - Static variable in class util.DateManager
Datetime format required by database.
formatterDateDBOnlyDate - Static variable in class util.DateManager
Datetime format required by database, but only date!
formatterDatePost - Static variable in class util.DateManager
New 2014/2015 - Used to get post date from Json object.
formatterDateToFile - Static variable in class util.DateManager
Used to format datetime to be write as file name.
formatterDateToFileWithTime - Static variable in class util.DateManager
Used to format datetime to be write as file name.
